name: CardBot (Jam Version)
description:
This is a game for the Mix and Game Jam 2020 with the theme Mixing Genres. For my game, my genre is Platformer x Card x Strategy.

As a player, you will control the robot with four type of cards, walk left, walk right, jump, and stop. Your goal is to help the robot to reach the teleporter in safe. But be careful, because there are hazards trying to kill the robot.

This is the jam version of the game, which means it is very unpolished and still have several things to be fixed. However, this game will still be under development even after the jam ended.
